Supplies.description: Amount of consideration paid in advance for supplies that provide economic benefits within a future period of one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsDecreasesResultin.label: Unrecognized Tax Benefits, Decrease Resulting from Prior Period Tax Positions
UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsDecreasesResultin.description: Amount of decrease in unrecognized tax benefits resulting from tax positions taken in prior period tax returns.

UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsIncreasesResultin.label: Unrecognized Tax Benefits, Increase Resulting from Current Period Tax Positions
UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsIncreasesResultin.description: Amount of increase in unrecognized tax benefits resulting from tax positions that have been or will be taken in current period tax return.

DebtInstrumentFaceAmount.label: Debt Instrument, Face Amount
DebtInstrumentFaceAmount.description: Face (par) amount of debt instrument at time of issuance.

OtherLiabilities.label: Other Liabilities
OtherLiabilities.description: Amount of liabilities classified as other.

ProceedsFromWarrantExercises.label: Proceeds from Warrant Exercises
ProceedsFromWarrantExercises.description: The cash inflow associated with the amount received from holders exercising their stock warrants.

Revenues.label: Revenues
Revenues.description: Amount of revenue recognized from goods sold, services rendered, insurance premiums, or other activities that constitute an earning process. Includes, but is not limited to, investment and interest income before deduction of interest expense when recognized as a component of revenue, and sales and trading gain (loss).

Cash.label: Cash
Cash.description: Amount of currency on hand as well as demand deposits with banks or financial institutions. Includes other kinds of accounts that have the general characteristics of demand deposits. Excludes cash and cash equivalents within disposal group and discontinued operation.

LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsRem.label: Lessee, Operating Lease, Liability, to be Paid, Remainder of Fiscal Year
LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsRem.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for operating lease having initial or remaining lease term in excess of one year to be paid in remainder of current fiscal year.

LiabilitiesFairValueDisclosure.label: Financial and Nonfinancial Liabilities, Fair Value Disclosure
LiabilitiesFairValueDisclosure.description: Fair value of financial and nonfinancial obligations.

LongTermDebtMaturitiesRepaymentsOfPrinci.label: Long-Term Debt, Maturity, Year One
LongTermDebtMaturitiesRepaymentsOfPrinci.description: Amount of long-term debt payable, sinking fund requirement, and other securities issued that are redeemable by holder at fixed or determinable price and date, maturing in next fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

PaymentOfFinancingAndStockIssuanceCosts.label: Payment of Financing and Stock Issuance Costs
PaymentOfFinancingAndStockIssuanceCosts.description: The total of the cash outflow during the period which has been paid to third parties in connection with debt origination, which will be amortized over the remaining maturity period of the associated long-term debt and the cost incurred directly for the issuance of equity securities.

ContractWithCustomerLiabilityRevenueReco.label: Contract with Customer, Liability, Revenue Recognized
ContractWithCustomerLiabilityRevenueReco.description: Amount of revenue recognized that was previously included in balance of obligation to transfer good or service to customer for which consideration from customer has been received or is due.

DepositLiabilityCurrent.label: Deposit Liability, Current
DepositLiabilityCurrent.description: The current portion, due within one year or one operating cycle, if longer, of deposits held other than customer deposits.

FinanceLeaseLiability.label: Finance Lease, Liability
FinanceLeaseLiability.description: Present value of lessee's discounted obligation for lease payments from finance lease.

FinanceLeaseLiabilityCurrent.label: Finance Lease, Liability, Current
FinanceLeaseLiabilityCurrent.description: Present value of lessee's discounted obligation for lease payments from finance lease, classified as current.

FinanceLeaseLiabilityNoncurrent.label: Finance Lease, Liability, Noncurrent
FinanceLeaseLiabilityNoncurrent.description: Present value of lessee's discounted obligation for lease payments from finance lease, classified as noncurrent.

FinanceLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.label: Finance Lease, Liability, Payment, Due
FinanceLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payments for finance lease.

FinanceLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDueNextTwel.label: Finance Lease, Liability, to be Paid, Year One
FinanceLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDueNextTwel.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for finance lease to be paid in next fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

FinanceLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDueYearFour.label: Finance Lease, Liability, to be Paid, Year Four
FinanceLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDueYearFour.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for finance lease to be paid in fourth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

FinanceLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDueYearThre.label: Finance Lease, Liability, to be Paid, Year Three
FinanceLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDueYearThre.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for finance lease to be paid in third fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

FinanceLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDueYearTwo.label: Finance Lease, Liability, to be Paid, Year Two
FinanceLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDueYearTwo.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for finance lease to be paid in second fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

FinanceLeaseLiabilityPaymentsRemainderOf.label: Finance Lease, Liability, to be Paid, Remainder of Fiscal Year
FinanceLeaseLiabilityPaymentsRemainderOf.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for finance lease to be paid in remainder of current fiscal year.

FinanceLeaseLiabilityUndiscountedExcessA.label: Finance Lease, Liability, Undiscounted Excess Amount
FinanceLeaseLiabilityUndiscountedExcessA.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payments in excess of discounted obligation for lease payments for finance lease.

FinanceLeaseRightOfUseAsset.label: Finance Lease, Right-of-Use Asset, after Accumulated Amortization
FinanceLeaseRightOfUseAsset.description: Amount, after accumulated amortization, of right-of-use asset from finance lease.

FinanceLeaseWeightedAverageDiscountRateP.label: Finance Lease, Weighted Average Discount Rate, Percent
FinanceLeaseWeightedAverageDiscountRateP.description: Weighted average discount rate for finance lease calculated at point in time.

ProceedsFromIssuanceOfLongTermDebt.label: Proceeds from Issuance of Long-term Debt
ProceedsFromIssuanceOfLongTermDebt.description: The cash inflow from a debt initially having maturity due after one year or beyond the operating cycle, if longer.

CurrentFederalTaxExpenseBenefit.label: Current Federal Tax Expense (Benefit)
CurrentFederalTaxExpenseBenefit.description: Amount of current federal tax expense (benefit) pertaining to income (loss) from continuing operations.

CurrentStateAndLocalTaxExpenseBenefit.label: Current State and Local Tax Expense (Benefit)
CurrentStateAndLocalTaxExpenseBenefit.description: Amount of current state and local tax expense (benefit) pertaining to income (loss) from continuing operations.

DeferredStateAndLocalIncomeTaxExpenseBen.label: Deferred State and Local Income Tax Expense (Benefit)
DeferredStateAndLocalIncomeTaxExpenseBen.description: Amount of deferred state and local tax expense (benefit) pertaining to income (loss) from continuing operations.

EffectiveIncomeTaxRateReconciliationChan.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Change in Enacted Tax Rate, Percent
EffectiveIncomeTaxRateReconciliationChan.description: Percentage of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to changes in the income tax rates.

GainLossOnSaleOfOtherAssets.label: Gain (Loss) on Disposition of Other Assets
GainLossOnSaleOfOtherAssets.description: Amount of gain (loss) on sale or disposal of other assets.

IncomeTaxReconciliationChangeInEnactedTa.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Change in Enacted Tax Rate, Amount
IncomeTaxReconciliationChangeInEnactedTa.description: Amount of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations, attributable to increase (decrease) in the income tax rates.

InventoryValuationReserves.label: Inventory Valuation Reserves
InventoryValuationReserves.description: Amount of valuation reserve for inventory.

ProceedsFromOtherEquity.label: Proceeds from Other Equity
ProceedsFromOtherEquity.description: Amount of cash inflow from the issuance of equity classified as other.

ProductWarrantyAccrualPayments.label: Standard and Extended Product Warranty Accrual, Decrease for Payments
ProductWarrantyAccrualPayments.description: Amount of decrease in the standard and extended product warranty accrual from payments made in cash or in kind to satisfy claims under the terms of the standard and extended product warranty.

ProductWarrantyAccrualWarrantiesIssued.label: Standard and Extended Product Warranty Accrual, Increase for Warranties Issued
ProductWarrantyAccrualWarrantiesIssued.description: Amount of increase in the standard and extended product warranty accrual from warranties issued.

CashCashEquivalentsRestrictedCashAndRest.label: Cash, Cash Equivalents, Restricted Cash and Restricted Cash Equivalents, Period Increase (Decrease), Excluding Exchange Rate Effect
CashCashEquivalentsRestrictedCashAndRest.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in cash and cash equivalents, and cash and cash equivalents restricted to withdrawal or usage; excluding effect from exchange rate change. Cash includes, but is not limited to, currency on hand, demand deposits with banks or financial institutions, and other accounts with general characteristics of demand deposits. Cash equivalents include, but are not limited to, short-term, highly liquid investments that are both readily convertible to known amounts of cash and so near their maturity that they present insignificant risk of changes in value because of changes in interest rates.

DebtInstrumentUnamortizedDiscount.label: Debt Instrument, Unamortized Discount
DebtInstrumentUnamortizedDiscount.description: Amount, after accumulated amortization, of debt discount.

OperatingLeaseRightOfUseAssetAmortizatio.label: Operating Lease, Right-of-Use Asset, Amortization Expense
OperatingLeaseRightOfUseAssetAmortizatio.description: Amount of amortization expense for right-of-use asset from operating lease.

OtherNonoperatingExpense.label: Other Nonoperating Expense
OtherNonoperatingExpense.description: Amount of expense related to nonoperating activities, classified as other.

DebtInstrumentInterestRateStatedPercenta.label: Debt Instrument, Interest Rate, Stated Percentage
DebtInstrumentInterestRateStatedPercenta.description: Contractual interest rate for funds borrowed, under the debt agreement.

OtherAssetsNoncurrent.label: Other Assets, Noncurrent
OtherAssetsNoncurrent.description: Amount of noncurrent assets classified as other.

PaymentsForRent.label: Payments for Rent
PaymentsForRent.description: Cash payments to lessor's for use of assets under operating leases.

SecurityDeposit.label: Security Deposit
SecurityDeposit.description: The amount of an asset, typically cash, provided to a counterparty to provide certain assurance of performance by the entity pursuant to the terms of a written or oral agreement, such as a lease.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementsByShar.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangements by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Expirations in Period, Weighted Average Exercise Price
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementsByShar.description: Weighted average price at which grantees could have acquired the underlying shares with respect to stock options of the plan that expired.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodSharesConversionO.label: Stock Issued During Period, Shares, Conversion of Units
StockIssuedDuringPeriodSharesConversionO.description: The number of shares issued during the period upon the conversion of units. An example of a convertible unit is an umbrella partnership real estate investment trust unit (UPREIT unit).

StockIssuedDuringPeriodSharesEmployeeSto.label: Stock Issued During Period, Shares, Employee Stock Purchase Plans
StockIssuedDuringPeriodSharesEmployeeSto.description: Number of shares issued during the period as a result of an employee stock purchase plan.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueEmployeeStoc.label: Stock Issued During Period, Value, Employee Stock Purchase Plan
StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueEmployeeStoc.description: Aggregate change in value for stock issued during the period as a result of employee stock purchase plan.

WarrantsAndRightsOutstanding.label: Warrants and Rights Outstanding
WarrantsAndRightsOutstanding.description: Value of outstanding derivative securities that permit the holder the right to purchase securities (usually equity) from the issuer at a specified price.

DeferredIncomeCurrent.label: Deferred Income, Current
DeferredIncomeCurrent.description: Amount of deferred income excluding obligation to transfer product and service to customer for which consideration has been received or is receivable, classified as current.

DeferredRevenueNoncurrent.label: Deferred Revenue, Noncurrent
DeferredRevenueNoncurrent.description: Amount of deferred income and obligation to transfer product and service to customer for which consideration has been received or is receivable, classified as noncurrent.

DerivativeLiabilitiesNoncurrent.label: Derivative Liability, Noncurrent
DerivativeLiabilitiesNoncurrent.description: Fair value, after the effects of master netting arrangements, of a financial liability or contract with one or more underlyings, notional amount or payment provision or both, and the contract can be net settled by means outside the contract or delivery of an asset, expected to be settled after one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer. Includes assets not subject to a master netting arrangement and not elected to be offset.

IncreaseDecreaseInDeferredRevenue.label: Increase (Decrease) in Deferred Revenue
IncreaseDecreaseInDeferredRevenue.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in deferred income and obligation to transfer product and service to customer for which consideration has been received or is receivable.

AssetsHeldForSaleNotPartOfDisposalGroupC.label: Assets Held-for-sale, Not Part of Disposal Group, Current
AssetsHeldForSaleNotPartOfDisposalGroupC.description: Amount of assets held-for-sale that are not part of a disposal group, expected to be sold within a year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

CostDirectLabor.label: Cost, Direct Labor
CostDirectLabor.description: Cost of labor directly related to good produced and service rendered. Includes, but is not limited to, payroll cost and equity-based compensation.

CostDirectMaterial.label: Cost, Direct Material
CostDirectMaterial.description: Cost of material used for good produced and service rendered.

CostOfGoodsAndServicesSoldOverhead.label: Cost, Overhead
CostOfGoodsAndServicesSoldOverhead.description: Indirect cost incurred related to good produced and service rendered.

DeferredTaxAssetsTaxDeferredExpenseReser.label: Deferred Tax Assets, Tax Deferred Expense, Reserves and Accruals, Legal Settlements
DeferredTaxAssetsTaxDeferredExpenseReser.description: Amount before allocation of valuation allowances of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible temporary differences from the estimated loss from legal settlements.

FinanceLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDueYearFive.label: Finance Lease, Liability, to be Paid, Year Five
FinanceLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDueYearFive.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for finance lease to be paid in fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

GainLossOnSalesOfAssetsAndAssetImpairmen.label: Gain (Loss) on Sale of Assets and Asset Impairment Charges
GainLossOnSalesOfAssetsAndAssetImpairmen.description: Amount of gain (loss) from the difference between the sale price or salvage price and the book value of an asset that was sold or retired, and gain (loss) from the write down of assets from their carrying value to fair value.

GainLossRelatedToLitigationSettlement.label: Gain (Loss) Related to Litigation Settlement
GainLossRelatedToLitigationSettlement.description: Amount of gain (loss) recognized in settlement of litigation and insurance claims. Excludes claims within an insurance entity's normal claims settlement process.

LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.label: Lessee, Operating Lease, Liability, to be Paid, after Year Five
LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for operating lease due after fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.label: Lessee, Operating Lease, Liability, to be Paid, Year Five
LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for operating lease to be paid in fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

LongTermDebtNoncurrent.label: Long-term Debt, Excluding Current Maturities
LongTermDebtNoncurrent.description: Amount after unamortized (discount) premium and debt issuance costs of long-term debt classified as noncurrent and excluding amounts to be repaid within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer. Includes, but not limited to, notes payable, bonds payable, debentures, mortgage loans and commercial paper. Excludes capital lease obligations.

NumberOfReportableSegments.label: Number of Reportable Segments
NumberOfReportableSegments.description: Number of segments reported by the entity. A reportable segment is a component of an entity for which there is an accounting requirement to report separate financial information on that component in the entity's financial statements.

OtherGeneralAndAdministrativeExpense.label: Other General and Administrative Expense
OtherGeneralAndAdministrativeExpense.description: Amount of general and administrative expense classified as other.

OtherSellingAndMarketingExpense.label: Other Selling and Marketing Expense
OtherSellingAndMarketingExpense.description: Amount of selling and marketing expense classified as other.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Grants in Period, Grant Date Intrinsic Value
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: The grant-date intrinsic value of options granted during the reporting period as calculated by applying the disclosed option pricing methodology.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueIssuedForSer.label: Stock Issued During Period, Value, Issued for Services
StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueIssuedForSer.description: Value of stock issued in lieu of cash for services contributed to the entity. Value of the stock issued includes, but is not limited to, services contributed by vendors and founders.

LoansPayable.label: Loans Payable
LoansPayable.description: Including the current and noncurrent portions, aggregate carrying value as of the balance sheet date of loans payable (with maturities initially due after one year or beyond the operating cycle if longer).

ProceedsFromIssuanceOfPreferredStockAndP.label: Proceeds from Issuance of Preferred Stock and Preference Stock
ProceedsFromIssuanceOfPreferredStockAndP.description: Proceeds from issuance of capital stock which provides for a specific dividend that is paid to the shareholders before any dividends to common stockholders and which takes precedence over common stockholders in the event of liquidation.

ProceedsFromIssuanceOrSaleOfEquity.label: Proceeds from Issuance or Sale of Equity
ProceedsFromIssuanceOrSaleOfEquity.description: The cash inflow from the issuance of common stock, preferred stock, treasury stock, stock options, and other types of equity.

SalariesAndWages.label: Salary and Wage, NonOfficer, Excluding Cost of Good and Service Sold
SalariesAndWages.description: Amount of expense for salary and wage arising from service rendered by nonofficer employee. Excludes allocated cost, labor-related nonsalary expense, and direct and overhead labor cost included in cost of good and service sold.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueConversionOf.label: Stock Issued During Period, Value, Conversion of Units
StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueConversionOf.description: Value of stock issued during the period upon the conversion of units. An example of a convertible unit is an umbrella partnership real estate investment trust unit (UPREIT unit).

SaleOfStockNumberOfSharesIssuedInTransac.label: Sale of Stock, Number of Shares Issued in Transaction
SaleOfStockNumberOfSharesIssuedInTransac.description: The number of shares issued or sold by the subsidiary or equity method investee per stock transaction.

SaleOfStockPercentageOfOwnershipBeforeTr.label: Sale of Stock, Percentage of Ownership before Transaction
SaleOfStockPercentageOfOwnershipBeforeTr.description: Percentage of subsidiary's or equity investee's stock owned by parent company before stock transaction.

SharesIssued.label: Shares, Issued
SharesIssued.description: Number of shares of stock issued as of the balance sheet date, including shares that had been issued and were previously outstanding but which are now held in the treasury.

FinanceLeasePrincipalPayments.label: Finance Lease, Principal Payments
FinanceLeasePrincipalPayments.description: Amount of cash outflow for principal payment on finance lease.

OperatingLeaseImpairmentLoss.label: Operating Lease, Impairment Loss
OperatingLeaseImpairmentLoss.description: Amount of loss from impairment of right-of-use asset from operating lease.

OtherAssetImpairmentCharges.label: Other Asset Impairment Charges
OtherAssetImpairmentCharges.description: The charge against earnings resulting from the write down of long lived assets other than goodwill due to the difference between the carrying value and lower fair value.

ProceedsFromContributedCapital.label: Proceeds from Contributed Capital
ProceedsFromContributedCapital.description: The cash inflow associated with the amount received by a corporation from a shareholder during the period.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Expirations in Period
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: Number of options or other stock instruments for which the right to exercise has lapsed under the terms of the plan agreements.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueConversionOf.label: Stock Issued During Period, Value, Conversion of Convertible Securities
StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueConversionOf.description: The gross value of stock issued during the period upon the conversion of convertible securities.
